blogPost.excerpt: See what your dumbest purchases would be worth if you bought Bitcoin instead.
blogPost.body: See what your dumbest purchases would be worth if you bought Bitcoin instead.
blogPost.title: Bitcoin or Stupid Shit - See how much your dumbest purchases would be worth in BTC
blogPost.author: Lazar Stojkovic

localize.description: 看看如果你买了比特币，你最愚蠢的购买行为会值多少钱。
localize.tagline: 看看你最愚蠢的购买行为在BTC中会值多少钱

localize.description: 看看如果你買了比特幣，你最愚蠢的購買行爲會值多少錢。
localize.tagline: 看看你最愚蠢的購買行爲在BTC中會值多少錢

previous.excerpt: We solve business needs by finding trade partners. We built a Checkout where the storeowner can say their needs, and the customers can checkout fulfilling the stores needs to get his product! Our MVP app got shopify editorial pick out of 5000 apps in 2 days
previous.title: baartr - Exchange your product/service to fullfil your business need

localize.description: 我们通过寻找贸易伙伴来解决商业需求。我们建立了一个Checkout，店主可以在这里说出自己的需求，而顾客可以在这里结账，满足店家的需求，获得他的产品! 我们的MVP应用在2天内获得了shopify编辑部从5000个应用中挑选出来的资格。
localize.tagline: 交换您的产品/服务，以满足您的业务需求。

localize.description: 我們通過尋找貿易伙伴來解決商業需求。我們建立了一個Checkout，店主可以在這裏說出自己的需求，而顧客可以在這裏結賬，滿足店家的需求，獲得他的產品! 我們的MVP應用在2天內獲得了shopify編輯部從5000個應用中挑選出來的資格。
localize.tagline: 交換您的產品/服務，以滿足您的業務需求。

next.excerpt: 1 Big App - functionality at your fingertips. You always get the latest version of all the apps. App collection updated regularly. You can request features!
